dict.string:
# # Select multiple images and then invoke this extension # to have it combine them into a single new image which # will be placed on your desktop. The new image will # automatically change the tiling from horizontal to # vertical depending on the width of the selected images. # # This extension requires that ImageMagick be installed. # # Version: 1.1 #
histchars= # Critical to prevent certain shell expansions. bash -l montage.sh "{query}"
# # Merge icon used under a Attribution 3.0 Unported license. # http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ # http://www.iconspedia.com/icon/merge-icon-19848.html #
Montage several images into a single image.
